document.full_text: zimbabwean president robert mugabe has hit back at criticism from southern african leaders, saying they cannot tell him how to run his country, the state-owned herald newspaper said on saturday.
document.title: robert mugabe hits back at regional criticism
lines_and_colors: zimbabwean president robert mugabe has hit back at criticism from southern african leaders, saying they cannot tell him how to run his country, the state-owned herald newspaper said on saturday.
